name: Take The Pill
description:
You play as Thomas Moore who has been having it rough at work and gets offered some pills to make life better. Those pills, like all drugs, have certain side effects. Play to discover the truth.

Made for first Neumont Game Jam

Controls

-------------------------------

WASD - Movement

1 - Pistol

2 - Shotgun

3 - SMG

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Esc - Pause menu
